entry.title: Abstraction On Basis
entry.content: layout: post title: “An Abstraction on Spectral Basis” description: A personal attempt to capture what the spectral basis means in machine learning, from the point of view of someone not classically trained in ML. date: 2025-06-01 tags: [spectral, abstraction, learning] categories: [thoughts] featured: true —
